title: (Tues Full) Can You Spot the Liar in ‘Two Truths and a Lie’? + Randy Houser on the Real Story of Him Bringing A Goat in the Studio + Performs a New Song + Bad Habits That May Be Good For You
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Can You Spot the Liar in ‘Two Truths and a Lie’? + Randy Houser on the Real Story of Him Bringing A Goat in the Studio + Performs a New Song + Bad Habits That May Be Good For You
description:
We’re playing a big name in honor of Bobby’s new TV show “Snake in the Grass”. If the listener can spot the liar in 2 Truths and a Lie….they can win $5,000 bucks! Each person shares a story and one of them is a lie. Randy Houser stops by the studio to talk about the first time we met him, and he brought in a goat, the jobs he had before music, his new album and how he takes pride in his life performance. Bobby shares a list of things that are viewed as bad habits that may actually have some health benefits.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
